newsitem.title: UK: GOLF-LEADING FIRST ROUND SCORES IN INTERNATIONAL TOURNAMENT.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-LEADING FIRST ROUND SCORES IN INTERNATIONAL TOURNAMENT.

text.p: in the Benson and Hedges International golf tournament on
69 Jonathan Lomas, Darren Clarke, Andrew Coltart, Lee Westwood,
Retief Goosen (South Africa), Peter Mitchell, Patrik Sjoland
70 Carl Suneson (Spain), Colin Montgomerie, Paul Lawrie,
Bernhard Langer (Germany), Paul Broadhurst, David Howell,
Kalle Vainola (Finland), Diego Borrego (Spain), Ian Woosnam,
Gary Orr, Ross McFarlane, Santiago Luna (Spain), Niclas
71 Paolo Quirici (Switzerland), Richard Boxall, Jose Coceres
Cooper, Peter Hedblom (Sweden), Paul Eales, Thomas Bjorn
72 Jonathan Robson, Phillip Price, Ronan Rafferty,
Miguel Angel Jimenez (Spain), Dean Robertson, Steve Webster,
Jim Payne, Iain Pyman, Francisco Roca (Spain), Ignacio Feliu
73 Rolf Muntz (Netherlands), Steven Richardson, Mark McNulty
Philip Walton (Ireland), Ricky Willison, John Murray
Eamonn Darcy (Ireland), Ian Mosey, Eduardo Romero
Rodger Davis (Australia), Daniel Chopra (Sweden), Daren Lee
